home.title: Software Developer
home.description: Passionate web and mobile developer with experience in creating innovative solutions using various technologies and managing databases. Currently learning blockchain, with a strong interest in this technology, and seeking opportunities to contribute to exciting projects.

services.description1: Designing and building high-performance, responsive websites using modern technologies to ensure a smooth user experience across all browsers and desktop devices.
services.description2: Designing and implementing robust, secure APIs to ensure seamless communication between various applications and services. Integrating third-party solutions to optimize processes and enhance system connectivity.
services.description3: Provide ongoing maintenance for applications and websites to ensure smooth operation, fix bugs, apply security updates, and enhance features according to evolving user needs.
services.description4: Enhancing natural search ranking through technical optimizations: loading speed, site structure, meta tags, optimized images, and content organization. Goal: better positioning in search engines and faster navigation.
services.description5: Currently learning and developing skills to build native and cross-platform mobile applications that offer seamless performance and user-friendly interfaces.
services.description6: Currently learning, exploring, and developing decentralized applications (dApps), smart contracts, and blockchain-based solutions to enhance transparency, security, and innovation in digital services.

resume.desc2: Academic background and professional journey in software development.
resume.desc3: Before mastering any framework, I focus on programming fundamentals. Currently, I work with several frameworks and technologies, some of which I am still learning, such as React Native and Solidity.
resume.desc4: Tools and editors I use daily to code efficiently.
resume.desc5: Databases I work with or learn.
resume.desc6: Passionate and dedicated developer with a keen interest in creating innovative digital solutions. Always eager to learn new technologies and improve skills to deliver high-quality projects. Adaptable and proactive, ready to take on new challenges.

resume.experience: Throughout my academic and professional journey, I have gained solid experience in software development, project management, team coaching, and system maintenance. These diverse experiences have allowed me to develop technical and organizational skills, as well as the ability to work effectively in a team

contact.title: Let's work together
contact.description: I'm excited to collaborate on innovative projects and help bring your ideas to life. Whether you have a question, want to discuss a project, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out. Let's create something amazing together!

work.work1_desc: Development of a car rental web application with vehicle, client, and booking management through both admin and client interfaces.
work.work2_desc: Flexible platform for content publishing, reader interaction, and audience growth, developed as a group project.
work.work3_desc: Innovative application allowing users to scan QR codes to vote anonymously, featuring a secure interface and real-time statistics.
work.work4_desc: School library management application for tracking loans, organizing documents, and improving the learning experience.
work.work5_desc: Design and development of a car stock management website to improve tracking and sales.
work.work6_title: Identity Authentication System via Blockchain (Group Project)
work.work6_desc: Group project focused on building a secure identity authentication system using blockchain technology.
